ygData.subject: A creaking base

Subject: A creaking base
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: kinger01030@...

 The base creaked tremendously. The transport had taken much energy. The 
computer was off. The cloak device was running smoothly. LUckily it had moved 
from its original destination as programed be destructor. It was about 500 
miles away from its original mountain landing. Inside awaited a machine. The 
machine was ready and waiting. Only waiting for the activation sequence. The 
green butto was covered with cob webs. War's spark went off line. The main 
computer switched on. On low so not to be detected. A hologram suddenly came 
up on the bridge. It was a hologram of destructor. It awaited its visiter. 
Hopefully Drill Bit would come swiftly. The ship noticed that Kit Kat was not 
on-line. The hologram sighed. As if it wher alive. The preds where seperated 
in two spots on the scanners. One group held Drill bit the other Megs. 
Hopefully Drillbit would arrive soon.
